alert.note: Alert for Camp (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 04 at 11:02PM CDT until October 04 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WOOD...NORTHWESTERN UPSHUR...WESTERN MORRIS...TITUS AND CAMP COUNTIES... At 1102 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Wilkerson to near Mount Pleasant to Leesburg to 7 miles east of Hainesville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant, Gilmer, Pittsburg, Leesburg, Rosewood, Cason, Wilkerson, Cookville, Newsome, Winfield, Midway, Miller`s Cove, Rocky Mound, Perryville, Holly Springs, Monticello, Roeder, Harvard, Lafayette, and Center Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
